name: PHP
summary: I have experience creating web apps using PHP because I started my carrier as PHP developer. Now while I'm not as a developer, I still create some experiments using PHP.

name: CSS3
summary: I'm not a designer. I use CSS for prototyping pages, create some basic layouts. I use Bootstrap a lot to make my job easier and I'm a LESS user.

name: Laravel
summary: This rising star framework is really must learned framework. It's packed with complete features, yet easy to extend. I'm still learning it, but it will be my main tool soon.

name: HTML
summary: Every web developer must know and familiar with.

name: jQuery
summary: I created web apps at the time when frontend framework like Angular are not so popular like today. And jQuery is always loaded in my page. From manipulating DOM to calling data from server with ajax, it's a 'to go' tool.

name: WordPress
summary: My blog is using WordPress. I create the theme myself. I create some plugins for clients in the past.

name: CodeIgniter
summary: You may won't believe that this framework is still exist, but that's the fact. And I master it.
